update WAQ_COL_MAP

RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_MAP_ID = #{colMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TBL_MAP_ID = #{tblMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_MAP_TYPE = #{colMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_SUBJ_ID = #{tgtSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH = #{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DB_ID = #{tgtDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DB_PNM = #{tgtDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_TBL_ID = #{tgtTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_TBL_LNM = #{tgtTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_TBL_PNM = #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_COL_ID = #{tgtColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_COL_LNM = #{tgtColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_COL_PNM = #{tgtColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DATA_TYPE = #{tgtDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DATA_LEN = #{tgtDataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TGT_SCAL = #{tgtScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TGT_PK_YN = #{tgtPkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_PK_ORD = #{tgtPkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TGT_NONUL_YN = #{tgtNonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DMN_ID = #{tgtDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DMN_PNM = #{tgtDmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DMN_LNM = #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_BIZ_ID = #{srcBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_BIZ_NM = #{srcBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_SYS_ID = #{srcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_SYS_NM = #{srcSysNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_COL_LNM = #{srcColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_COL_PNM = #{srcColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DESCN = #{srcDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DATA_TYPE = #{srcDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DATA_LEN = #{srcDataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SRC_SCAL = #{srcScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COL_ORD = #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEFLT_VAL = #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_CND_NM = #{mapCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_REF_DB_PNM = #{colRefDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COL_REF_TBL_PNM = #{colRefTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JN_CND_NM = #{jnCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CRGP_ID = #{appCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CRGP_NM = #{appCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNVS_CRGP_ID = #{cnvsCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNVS_CRGP_NM = #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_CHRG = #{tgtChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_COL_MAP set RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_MAP_ID = #{colMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TBL_MAP_ID = #{tblMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_DF_ID = #{mapDfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_MAP_TYPE = #{colMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_SUBJ_ID = #{tgtSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH = #{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DB_ID = #{tgtDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DB_PNM = #{tgtDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_TBL_ID = #{tgtTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_TBL_LNM = #{tgtTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_TBL_PNM = #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_COL_ID = #{tgtColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_COL_LNM = #{tgtColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_COL_PNM = #{tgtColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DATA_TYPE = #{tgtDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DATA_LEN = #{tgtDataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TGT_SCAL = #{tgtScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TGT_PK_YN = #{tgtPkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_PK_ORD = #{tgtPkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TGT_NONUL_YN = #{tgtNonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_ID = #{tgtDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_PNM = #{tgtDmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_LNM = #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_BIZ_ID = #{srcBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_BIZ_NM = #{srcBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_SYS_ID = #{srcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_SYS_NM = #{srcSysNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_COL_LNM = #{srcColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_COL_PNM = #{srcColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DESCN = #{srcDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DATA_TYPE = #{srcDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DATA_LEN = #{srcDataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SRC_SCAL = #{srcScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COL_ORD = #{colOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEFLT_VAL = #{defltVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_CND_NM = #{mapCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_REF_DB_PNM = #{colRefDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL_REF_TBL_PNM = #{colRefTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JN_CND_NM = #{jnCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CRGP_ID = #{appCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CRGP_NM = #{appCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNVS_CRGP_ID = #{cnvsCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNVS_CRGP_NM = #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_CHRG = #{tgtChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
--컬럼매핑정의서 요청서 리스트 조회 SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.OBJ_VERS, A.OBJ_DESCN , A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.COL_MAP_ID, A.TBL_MAP_ID, A.MAP_DF_ID, A.MAP_DF_TYPE, A.COL_MAP_TYPE, A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH , A.TGT_DB_ID, A.TGT_DB_PNM, A.TGT_TBL_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM, A.TGT_TBL_PNM, A.TGT_COL_ID, A.TGT_COL_LNM , A.TGT_COL_PNM, A.TGT_DATA_TYPE, A.TGT_DATA_LEN, A.TGT_SCAL, A.TGT_PK_YN, A.TGT_PK_ORD, A.TGT_NONUL_YN , A.TGT_DMN_ID, A.TGT_DMN_PNM, A.TGT_DMN_LNM, A.SRC_BIZ_ID, A.SRC_BIZ_NM, A.SRC_SYS_ID, A.SRC_SYS_NM, A.SRC_DB_ID, A.SRC_DB_PNM , A.SRC_TBL_ID, A.SRC_TBL_LNM, A.SRC_TBL_PNM, A.SRC_COL_LNM, A.SRC_COL_PNM, A.SRC_DESCN, A.SRC_DATA_TYPE, A.SRC_DATA_LEN , A.SRC_SCAL, A.COL_ORD, A.DEFLT_VAL, A.MAP_CND_NM, A.COL_REF_DB_PNM, A.COL_REF_TBL_PNM, A.JN_CND_NM , A.APP_CRGP_ID, A.APP_CRGP_NM, A.CNVS_CRGP_ID, A.CNVS_CRGP_NM, A.TGT_CHRG
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor FROM WAQ_COL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP A SET (A.COL_MAP_ID,A.REG_TYP_CD) = (SELECT MAX(B.COL_MAP_ID ),CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.COL_MAP_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_COL_MAP B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND B.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND NVL(B.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(B.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

--소스(ASIS)정보 공백처리(컬럼매핑유형:신규) UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP A SET A.SRC_BIZ_ID = '', A.SRC_BIZ_NM = '', A.SRC_SYS_ID = '', A.SRC_SYS_NM = '', A.SRC_DB_ID = '', A.SRC_DB_PNM = '', A.SRC_TBL_ID = '', A.SRC_TBL_LNM = '', A.SRC_TBL_PNM = '', A.SRC_COL_LNM = '', A.SRC_COL_PNM = '', A.SRC_DESCN = '', A.SRC_DATA_TYPE = '' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NVL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') = '2'

--타겟(TOBE)테이블 주제영역정보 업데이트(엑셀업로드시_변경) UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP A SET (A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM,A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH) = ( SELECT D.TGT_SUBJ_ID, D.TGT_TBL_LNM, D.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH FROM WAM_COL_MAP D WHERE D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND NVL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH IS NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP D WHERE D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND NVL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') )

--타겟(TOBE)테이블 주제영역정보 업데이트(엑셀업로드시_신규) UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP A SET (A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM, A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH) = (SELECT B.SUBJ_ID, B.PDM_TBL_LNM, B.FULL_PATH FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND ROWNUM = 1 ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND ROWNUM = 1 )

--타겟(TOBE)테이블 주제영역정보 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP A SET (A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM) = (SELECT B.SUBJ_ID, B.PDM_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.FULL_PATH = NVL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH,'X') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.FULL_PATH = NVL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH,'X') )

--타겟(TOBE)테이블 DB정보 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP A SET (A.TGT_DB_ID, A.TGT_TBL_ID) = (SELECT B.DDL_DB_ID, B.PDM_TBL_ID FROM V_WAM_DDL_SUBJ B WHERE B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.DDL_DB_PNM = NVL(A.TGT_DB_PNM,'X') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM V_WAM_DDL_SUBJ B WHERE B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.DDL_DB_PNM = NVL(A.TGT_DB_PNM,'X') )

--타겟(TOBE)컬럼정보 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP A SET (A.TGT_COL_ID, A.TGT_COL_LNM, A.TGT_DATA_TYPE, A.TGT_PK_YN, A.TGT_PK_ORD, A.TGT_NONUL_YN, A.TGT_DMN_ID, A.TGT_DMN_PNM, A.TGT_DMN_LNM, A.COL_ORD) = ( SELECT C.PDM_COL_ID, C.PDM_COL_LNM, --CONCAT_DATATYPE(C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL) AS DATA_TYPE , CASE WHEN C.DATA_LEN IS NULL THEN C.DATA_TYPE ELSE (CASE WHEN DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN C.DATA_TYPE || '(' || C.DATA_LEN ||', '|| C.DATA_SCAL ||')' ELSE C.DATA_TYPE || '(' || C.DATA_LEN ||')' END ) END AS DATA_TYPE, C.PK_YN, C.PK_ORD, C.NONUL_YN, F.DMN_ID, F.DMN_PNM, F.DMN_LNM, C.COL_ORD FROM WAM_PDM_COL C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT D.SDITM_ID, E.DMN_ID, E.DMN_LNM, E.DMN_PNM FROM WAM_SDITM D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID ) F ON C.SDITM_ID = F.SDITM_ID WHERE C.PDM_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND C.PDM_TBL_ID = A.TGT_TBL_ID ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_COL C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT D.SDITM_ID, E.DMN_ID, E.DMN_LNM, E.DMN_PNM FROM WAM_SDITM D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID ) F ON C.SDITM_ID = F.SDITM_ID WHERE C.PDM_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND C.PDM_TBL_ID = A.TGT_TBL_ID )

--테이블매핑정의서ID 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP A SET (A.TBL_MAP_ID) = ( SELECT C.TBL_MAP_ID FROM WAM_TBL_MAP C WHERE C.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND NVL(C.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(C.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP C WHERE C.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND NVL(C.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(C.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') )
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 요청서내 중복 컬럼매핑정의서(CM001) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND NVL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)

--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 컬럼매핑정의서 미존재(CM002) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP D WHERE D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND NVL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') )

--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 컬럼매핑정의서 (TM003) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_COL_MAP D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO LEFT JOIN WAM_TBL_MAP T ON T.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND NVL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' AND T.TBL_MAP_TYPE = 'M' )
--검증쿼리 : 응용담당자외 등록,수정,삭제 불가(CM004) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP B WHERE NVL(A.APP_CRGP_NM, 'X') != NVL(B.APP_CRGP_NM, 'O') AND NVL(A.MAP_DF_ID, 'X') = NVL(B.MAP_DF_ID, 'O') )
--검증쿼리 : 타겟테이블 미존재(CM005) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.TGT_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM )
--검증쿼리 : 타겟컬럼 미존재(CM006) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_COL D WHERE A.TGT_COL_PNM = D.PDM_COL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 소스테이블 미존재(CM013) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ASIS_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.SRC_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP M WHERE A.SRC_TBL_PNM = M.TGT_TBL_PNM ) AND NVL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') != '2'

--검증쿼리 : 소스컬럼 미존재(CM014) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ASIS_PDM_COL D WHERE A.SRC_COL_PNM = D.PDM_COL_PNM UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP M WHERE A.SRC_COL_PNM = M.TGT_COL_PNM UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP Q WHERE A.SRC_COL_PNM = Q.TGT_COL_PNM AND A.RQST_NO = Q.RQST_NO ) AND NVL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') != '2'
--검증쿼리 : 매핑조건 미존재(CM015) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.MAP_CND_NM IS NULL AND NVL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') = '1'

--검증쿼리 : 누락된 타겟컬럼 존재(CM007) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_COL D INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL F ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = F.PDM_TBL_ID WHERE A.TGT_TBL_ID = F.PDM_TBL_ID AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP E WHERE E.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND E.TGT_COL_PNM = D.PDM_COL_PNM ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP G WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = G.MAP_DF_ID AND A.SRC_TBL_PNM = G.SRC_TBL_PNM)
--검증쿼리 : 매핑정의서ID 미존재(CM008) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP D WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID )
--검증쿼리 : 타겟매핑테이블 미존재(CM009) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP D WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID AND A.TGT_TBL_PNM = D.TGT_TBL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 소스매핑테이블 미존재(CM010) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP D WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID --AND NVL(A.SRC_BIZ_NM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_BIZ_NM, 'X') --AND NVL(A.SRC_SYS_NM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_SYS_NM, 'X') AND NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP D WHERE A.SRC_TBL_PNM = D.TGT_TBL_PNM ) AND NVL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') != '2'

--검증쿼리 : 소스정보 누락(CM011) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NVL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') != '2' AND ( NVL(A.SRC_BIZ_NM, 'X') = 'X' OR NVL(A.SRC_SYS_NM, 'X') = 'X' OR NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = 'X' OR NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = 'X' OR NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = 'X' OR NVL(A.SRC_DATA_TYPE, 'X') = 'X' )
--검증쿼리 : 디폴트값 누락(CM012) AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NVL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') = '1' AND A.TGT_NONUL_YN = 'Y' AND A.TGT_PK_YN != 'Y' AND A.DEFLT_VAL IS NULL

--검증쿼리 : 변경일 때 변경된 데이터가 없을 경우 (CM000) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP D WHERE D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND NVL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND NVL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE, '_') = NVL(D.COL_MAP_TYPE, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_SUBJ_ID, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_TBL_LNM, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_TBL_LNM, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_COL_LNM, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_COL_LNM, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_DATA_TYPE, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_DATA_TYPE, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_PK_YN, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_PK_YN, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_NONUL_YN, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_NONUL_YN, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_DMN_LNM, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_DMN_LNM, '_') AND NVL(A.SRC_BIZ_NM, '_') = NVL(D.SRC_BIZ_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.SRC_SYS_NM, '_') = NVL(D.SRC_SYS_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.SRC_TBL_LNM, '_') = NVL(D.SRC_TBL_LNM, '_') AND NVL(A.SRC_COL_LNM, '_') = NVL(D.SRC_COL_LNM, '_') AND NVL(A.SRC_DESCN, '_') = NVL(D.SRC_DESCN, '_') AND NVL(A.SRC_DATA_TYPE, '_') = NVL(D.SRC_DATA_TYPE, '_') AND NVL(A.COL_ORD, 1 ) = NVL(D.COL_ORD, 1 ) AND NVL(A.DEFLT_VAL, '_') = NVL(D.DEFLT_VAL, '_') AND NVL(A.MAP_CND_NM, '_') = NVL(D.MAP_CND_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.COL_REF_DB_PNM, '_') = NVL(D.COL_REF_DB_PNM, '_') AND NVL(A.COL_REF_TBL_PNM, '_') = NVL(D.COL_REF_TBL_PNM, '_') AND NVL(A.JN_CND_NM, '_') = NVL(D.JN_CND_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.MAP_CND_NM, '_') = NVL(D.MAP_CND_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.MAP_CND_NM, '_') = NVL(D.MAP_CND_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.APP_CRGP_NM, '_') = NVL(D.APP_CRGP_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.CNVS_CRGP_NM, '_') = NVL(D.CNVS_CRGP_NM, '_') AND NVL(A.TGT_CHRG, '_') = NVL(D.TGT_CHRG, '_') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATE , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT * FROM WAQ_COL_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update:
--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_COL_MAP A SET (COL_MAP_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.COL_MAP_ID AS COL_MAP_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_COL_MAP B WHERE B.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND B.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND B.COL_MAP_ID = A.COL_MAP_ID --AND NVL(B.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') --AND NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') --AND NVL(B.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP B WHERE B.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND B.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND B.COL_MAP_ID = A.COL_MAP_ID --AND NVL(B.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') --AND NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') --AND NVL(B.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X')
)
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_COL_MAP A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND B.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND B.COL_MAP_ID = A.COL_MAP_ID --AND NVL(B.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') --AND NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') --AND NVL(B.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_COL_MAP SELECT COL_MAP_ID
FROM WAQ_COL_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_COL_MAP A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND B.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND B.COL_MAP_ID = A.COL_MAP_ID --AND NVL(B.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') --AND NVL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') --AND NVL(B.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = NVL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_COL_MAP SELECT A.COL_MAP_ID AS COL_MAP_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , SYSDATE AS STR_DTM
FROM WAQ_COL_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.select:
--컬럼매핑정의서 테이블 추가대상 조회... SELECT (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_COL_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo} ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_SNO , 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , A.COL_MAP_ID , A.TBL_MAP_ID , #{reqmst.rqstDcd} AS RQST_DCD , A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.OBJ_VERS, A.OBJ_DESCN , A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.MAP_DF_ID, A.TBL_MAP_ID, B.MAP_DF_TYPE, A.COL_MAP_TYPE, A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH , A.TGT_DB_ID, A.TGT_DB_PNM, A.TGT_TBL_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM, A.TGT_TBL_PNM, A.TGT_COL_ID, A.TGT_COL_LNM , A.TGT_COL_PNM, A.TGT_DATA_TYPE, A.TGT_DATA_LEN, A.TGT_SCAL, A.TGT_PK_YN, A.TGT_PK_ORD, A.TGT_NONUL_YN , A.TGT_DMN_ID, A.TGT_DMN_PNM, A.TGT_DMN_LNM, A.SRC_BIZ_ID, A.SRC_BIZ_NM, A.SRC_SYS_ID, A.SRC_SYS_NM , A.SRC_DB_ID, A.SRC_DB_PNM, A.SRC_TBL_ID, A.SRC_TBL_LNM, A.SRC_TBL_PNM, A.SRC_COL_LNM, A.SRC_COL_PNM , A.SRC_DESCN, A.SRC_DATA_TYPE, A.SRC_DATA_LEN, A.SRC_SCAL, A.COL_ORD, A.DEFLT_VAL, A.MAP_CND_NM , A.COL_REF_DB_PNM, A.COL_REF_TBL_PNM, A.JN_CND_NM, A.APP_CRGP_ID, A.APP_CRGP_NM, A.CNVS_CRGP_ID, A.TGT_CHRG FROM WAM_COL_MAP A INNER JOIN WAM_TBL_MAP B ON A.MAP_DF_ID = B.MAP_DF_ID AND NVL2(A.SRC_TBL_PNM,A.SRC_TBL_PNM,'X') = NVL2(A.SRC_TBL_PNM,B.SRC_TBL_PNM,'X') WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.TBL_MAP_ID IN
#{item.tblMapId}

--컬럼매핑정의서 타겟컬럼 리스트 조회 SELECT B.PDM_TBL_ID AS TGT_TBL_ID, B.PDM_TBL_PNM AS TGT_TBL_PNM, B.PDM_TBL_LNM AS TGT_TBL_LNM, B.SUBJ_ID AS TGT_SUBJ_ID, B.FULL_PATH AS TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, C.PDM_COL_ID AS TGT_COL_ID, C.PDM_COL_PNM AS TGT_COL_PNM, C.PDM_COL_LNM AS TGT_COL_LNM, --CONCAT_DATATYPE(C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL) AS TGT_DATA_TYPE , CASE WHEN C.DATA_LEN IS NULL THEN C.DATA_TYPE ELSE (CASE WHEN DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN C.DATA_TYPE || '(' || C.DATA_LEN ||', '|| C.DATA_SCAL ||')' ELSE C.DATA_TYPE || '(' || C.DATA_LEN ||')' END ) END AS DATA_TYPE, C.PK_YN AS TGT_PK_YN, C.PK_ORD AS TGT_PK_ORD, C.NONUL_YN AS TGT_NONUL_YN, F.DMN_ID AS TGT_DMN_ID, F.DMN_PNM AS TGT_DMN_PNM, F.DMN_LNM AS TGT_DMN_LNM, C.COL_ORD AS COL_ORD FROM WAM_TBL_MAP M INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL B ON M.TGT_TBL_PNM = B.PDM_TBL_PNM AND B.SUBJ_ID = M.TGT_SUBJ_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL C ON B.PDM_TBL_ID = C.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT D.SDITM_ID, E.DMN_ID, E.DMN_LNM, E.DMN_PNM FROM WAM_SDITM D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID WHERE D.STND_ASRT = 'CM' ) F ON C.SDITM_ID = F.SDITM_ID
AND (C.PDM_COL_PNM LIKE '%' || #{tgtColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR C.PDM_COL_LNM LIKE '%' || #{tgtColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
AND (B.PDM_TBL_LNM LIKE '%' || #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR B.PDM_TBL_PNM LIKE '%' || #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
ORDER BY B.PDM_TBL_PNM ,C.COL_ORD
